subject: Re: [junit] Running Ant and Junit in Visual Age
msgSnippet: ... I m not, but I ve seen it done. In addition, a new version of Eclipse (http://www.eclipse.org), which is the successor to VisualAge, has a nice Ant
messageBody:
>Is anybody running Ant and Junit under Visual Age??

I'm not, but I've seen it done. In addition, a new version of Eclipse
(http://www.eclipse.org), which is the successor to VisualAge, has a nice
Ant plug-in.

--jk
